text: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

translation.en: Allah is Subtle with His servants; He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the Powerful, the Exalted in Might
translation.id: Allah Mahalembut terhadap hamba-hamba-Nya; Dia memberi rezeki kepada siapa yang Dia kehendaki, dan Dia Mahakuat, Mahaperkasa
